abstract: William D. Johnson, the ousted chief executive of Duke Energy, was named the new head of the Tennessee Valley Authority, the government-created provider of wholesale power in Tennessee and parts of six other southern states.
snippet: William D. Johnson, the ousted chief executive of Duke Energy, was named the new head of the Tennessee Valley Authority, the government-created provider of wholesale power in Tennessee and parts of six other southern states.
lead_paragraph: William D. Johnson, the ousted chief executive of Duke Energy, was named the new head of the Tennessee Valley Authority, the government-created provider of wholesale power in Tennessee and parts of six other southern states.

headline.main: Ousted Duke Energy Chief Named Head of Tennessee Utility
